name: Sudoku - number puzzles
description:
Our Sudoku puzzle will bring you unique gaming experience! Easier levels help you exercise your brain, logical reasoning and memory; harder levels bring you a powerful real mind workout. Train your brain with Sudoku anywhere, anytime, enjoy the pleasant of number blast!

Game mode:
Four grid: Fill a 4x4 grid with digits so that each column, each row contains all of the digits from 1-4. Sudoku beginners can learn a lot from this mode.
Six grid: Fill a 6x6 grid with digits so that each column, each row contains all of the digits from 1-6.
Standard: Fill a 9x9 grid with digits so that each column, each row contains all of the digits from 1 to 9. This mode will greatly exercise your logic and mind.

Hope you enjoy Our Sudoku game！
